content.json:
##### Change log 1.0 - Initial version.
1.1 - Added data for non-interactive logons.
1.2 - Added additional logon and IP details. Bug fixes.
1.3 - Improved graphs.

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| where (UserPrincipalName matches regex @"^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}") == false
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
    | where (UserPrincipalName matches regex @"^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}") == false)
| make-series NumberOfFailedLogons = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 1h)
| extend (RSquare,Slope,Variance,RVariance,Interception,LineFit) = series_fit_line(NumberOfFailedLogons)
| project TimeGenerated, NumberOfFailedLogons, LineFit
content.title: Number of failed logons by hour (with trend line)

paramValidationRules.message: The number must be greater than 0

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where (UserPrincipalName matches regex @"^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}") == false
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where (UserPrincipalName matches regex @"^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}") == false
    )
| summarize Interactive = countif(Category == "SignInLogs"), NonInteractive = countif(Category == "NonInteractiveUserSignInLogs"), Summary=count() by UserPrincipalName
| sort by Summary desc
| take {NumberOfRecords}
content.title: Total number of failed logons  - Top {NumberOfRecords} (select user to display details)

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1'))
| make-series SuccesfullLogons = countif(ResultType in ("0", "50125", "50140")),
    BadLogonsInteractive = countif(ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140") and Category == "SignInLogs"), 
    BadLogonsNonInteractive = countif(ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140") and Category == "NonInteractiveUserSignInLogs") on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d
content.title: Logons accross time for {AccountName}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
    | extend LocationDetails = todynamic(LocationDetails))
| summarize FailedLogons = count() by IPAddress, Country = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion), 
    State = tostring(LocationDetails.state), City = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| project IPAddress, FailedLogons, Country, State, City
| order by FailedLogons
content.title: IP addresses list for {AccountName}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1'))
| summarize FailedLogons = count() by IPAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Bad logons per source IP for {AccountName}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where IPAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where IPAddress == "{IPAddress}")
| summarize SuccesfullLogons = countif(ResultType in ("0", "50125", "50140")),
    BadLogonsInteractive = countif(ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140") and Category == "SignInLogs"), 
    BadLogonsNonInteractive = countif(ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140") and Category == "NonInteractiveUserSignInLogs") by UserPrincipalName
content.title: Other users loging from {IPAddress}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, ResultType, ResultDescription, IPAddress, ClientAppUsed, DeviceDisplayName = DeviceDetail.displayName, OperatingSystem = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, DeviceTrust = DeviceDetail.trustType, AuthenticationRequirement, ResourceDisplayName, AppDisplayName, Country = LocationDetails.countryOrRegion, City = LocationDetails.city
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Event details for {AccountName} - Interactive

content.query:
AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| extend Location = todynamic(LocationDetails)
| extend Device = todynamic(DeviceDetail)
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, ResultType, ResultDescription, IPAddress, ClientAppUsed, DeviceDisplayName = Device.displayName, OperatingSystem = Device.operatingSystem, DeviceTrust = Device.trustType, AuthenticationRequirement, AppDisplayName, ResourceDisplayName, Country = Location.countryOrRegion, City = Location.city
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Event details for {AccountName} - Non Interactive
